query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
1 Oppresso di stupore, a la mia guida 2 mi volsi, come parvol che ricorre 3 sempre colà dove più si confida;
query.error: **English:** 1 Oppressed with amazement, to my guide 2 I turned, like a child who runs back 3 always to where he trusts the most;
query.result: 1 Gorrys gans an gwella, dhe'meth aga arweydh, 2 y'm droes orth, kepar flogh a-redya, 3 byth dhe'meth le may hy a-fussa moy.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
4 e quella, come madre che soccorre 5 sùbito al figlio palido e anelo 6 con la sua voce, che ’l suol ben disporre,
query.error: **English:** 4 and she, like a mother who helps 5 her pale and breathless son suddenly 6 with her voice, which can calm him,
query.result: 4 Ha'gan mamm a-skoedha aga flogh, 5 orth a-ugh, gwyn ha'gan analan, 6 gans aga lef, ow a-wra dhe'meth moy.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
7 mi disse: «Non sai tu che tu se’ in cielo? 8 e non sai tu che ’l cielo è tutto santo, 9 e ciò che ci si fa vien da buon zelo?
query.error: **English:** 7 said to me: “Don’t you know that you are in heaven? 8 And don’t you know that heaven is all holy, 9 and that everything that is done here comes from good zeal?
query.result: 7 Hi a leveris: “Na wodhvos ty dhe'meth yn nef?” 8 Ha'gan na wodhvos ty dhe'meth nef a-ugh sans?” 9 Ha'gan pub tra a-wra yma a-dhyworth da bara da.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
10 Come t’avrebbe trasmutato il canto, 11 e io ridendo, mo pensar lo puoi, 12 poscia che ’l grido t’ha mosso cotanto;
query.error: **English:** 10 How the song would have transformed you, 11 and you can imagine now, as I smile, 12 since the cry moved you so much;
query.result: 10 Pyth a-wra an kan a-wra dhe'meth chanjys, 11 Ha'gan vy owth a-chwerthin, mes a-galla gallos, 12 Wosa'gan an lef a-wra dhe'meth moy kemmys.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
13 nel qual, se ’nteso avessi i prieghi suoi, 14 già ti sarebbe nota la vendetta 15 che tu vedrai innanzi che tu muoi.
query.error: **English:** 13 in which, if you had understood its prayers, 14 you would already know the vengeance 15 that you will see before you die.
query.result: 13 Orth y'th eusys aga pednow y'nno, 14 Hi a-wra wodhvos orth an venjans, 15 Pyth a-wel orth kyns dhe'meth marow.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
16 La spada di qua sù non taglia in fretta 17 né tardo, ma’ ch’al parer di colui 18 che disïando o temendo l’aspetta.
query.error: **English:** 16 The sword from up here does not cut quickly 17 nor slowly, but according to the opinion of the one 18 who awaits it, desiring or fearing it.
query.result: 16 An kledha a-ugh a-ugh na dhef bys vyth 17 na hwar, mes mar an gweles a’n onan 18 a wra desiryas po a-dredhyas ev.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
19 Ma rivolgiti omai inverso altrui; 20 ch’assai illustri spiriti vedrai, 21 se com’ io dico l’aspetto redui».
query.error: **English:** 19 But turn now towards others; 20 for you will see many illustrious spirits, 21 if you reduce your gaze as I say.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
22 Come a lei piacque, li occhi ritornai, 23 e vidi cento sperule che ’nsieme 24 più s’abbellivan con mutüi rai.
query.error: **English:** 22 As it pleased her, I turned my eyes, 23 and I saw a hundred little spheres that together 24 adorned themselves more with their mutual rays.
query.result: 22 Vel ythollyas, ythdroe vy lagha, 23 ha'm gweles kans sper avel o onan 24 moy avellys gans aga gilyow kemmyn.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
25 Io stava come quei che ’n sé repreme 26 la punta del disio, e non s’attenta 27 di domandar, sì del troppo si teme;
query.error: **English:** 25 I stood like one who regains within himself 26 the point of desire, and does not dare 27 to ask, so much does he fear excess;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
28 e la maggiore e la più luculenta 29 di quelle margherite innanzi fessi, 30 per far di sé la mia voglia contenta.
query.error: **English:** 28 and the greatest and most brilliant 29 of those pearls came forward, 30 to satisfy my desire for herself.
query.result: 28 Ha an moyha ha moyha golow 29 a'gan perlys re beu, 30 rag gulfyllya vy hys gans aga honan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.result: 31 Wosa henna, y klevys: "Mar a weles 32 pena'gas an garow a wra dhe'n ni, 33 aga konsepyow a via dallethys.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.error: **English:** 34 But so that you, waiting, do not delay 35 your lofty goal, I will answer you 36 even in thought, since it concerns you so.
query.result: 34 Mes rag hemma, dell wosa omos, na let 35 dhe'gas an pal uhella, vy a wra'gas 36 dhe'gas dhe'n powes, dell yw dhe'gas moy wel.
